name: European Alliance for Georgia
goal:
* Establishing productive dialogue and communication of the Georgian society and authorities with their European counterparts;

* Supporting and promoting cooperation and partnership between communities, businesses and organizations in Georgia and Europe;

* Facilitating the attracting of FDI to Georgian economy and the implementation of the investment projects in Georgia;

* Raising Georgia's visibility in Europe and the West;

* Promoting friendly relations and cooperation between Georgia and Belgium and Luxembourg;
interests: Communication, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives:
Eastern Partnership Initiative,
European Neighbourhood Policy
EU-Georgia Friendship Group (non-formal group in the EP)
Regional Policies
Foreign and Security Policies
Energy
